message.content: {"flashcards":[{"question":"What is a flashcard?","answer":"A card containing a small amount of information, held up for students to see, as an aid to learning."},{"question":"What is spaced repetition?","answer":"A learning technique that incorporates increasing intervals of time between subsequent review of previously learned material."},{"question":"What is active recall?","answer":"A learning principle which involves actively stimulating memory during the learning process."},{"question":"How do flashcards help with learning?","answer":"They promote active recall and spaced repetition, two powerful learning techniques."},{"question":"What makes an effective flashcard?","answer":"Simple questions, clear answers, and focusing on one concept per card."}]}
